thread.title: Report: Lamar Odom Tested Positive for Cocaine
thread.title_full: Report: Lamar Odom Tested Positive for Cocaine

author: TV Guide
title: Report: Lamar Odom Tested Positive for Cocaine
text: Posted Oct. 26, 2015 at 4:09 PM Updated at 7:22 PM Posted Oct. 26, 2015 at 4:09 PM Updated at 7:22 PM A blood test that was given to Lamar Odom after he was rushed to the hospital on Oct. 13 has come back positive for cocaine, TMZ reports. The news is not unexpected - several sources had reported that Odom had taken several drugs , including crack cocaine and herbal sexual enhancements, during a three-day stay at a legal brothel in Nevada. However, according to TMZ, the Nye County Sheriff had previously stated that, if Odom tested positive for cocaine, it's likely that he'll face drug charges. Odom was found unconscious at the brothel on Oct. 13 and spent several days in a coma. The NBA star is currently recovering in Los Angeles and his estranged wife, Khloe Kardashian , has called off their divorce , reportedly on the condition that Odom stop using drugs.
